meanings.definition: Connected to or accessible via the internet.
meanings.sent1: The online class was easy to join.
meanings.sent2: I prefer shopping online for convenience.
meanings.sent3: The cat's online profile was quite popular among other pets.
meanings.sent4: Her online presence shone brighter than the rest.
meanings.sent5: The online world is vast and full of information.

meanings.definition: In operation or in use on a computer or network.
meanings.sent1: The online game was exciting to play.
meanings.sent2: Make sure your antivirus software is always online.
meanings.sent3: The toaster went online and started chatting with the fridge.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked like an online search engine, quick and efficient.
meanings.sent5: The online system crashed due to high traffic.
